descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An intensive writing workshop designed to help third-year art history Ph.D. students develop their dissertation proposals.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Class participationPeer assessmentWriting assignmentsAssessment will be based on weekly writing exercises, presentations, and participation in class discussion, including critiques of fellow students' work.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Readings will be posted on Canvas or made available on reserve at the main library.
